sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

ensureUniqueParams.description: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not).

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

variableNamingConvention.description: naming convention of variable name, e.g. camelCase.

invokerPackage.description: The main namespace to use for all classes. e.g. Yay\Pets

packagePath.description: The main package name for classes. e.g. GeneratedPetstore

srcBasePath.description: The directory under packagePath to serve as source root.

composerVendorName.description: The vendor name used in the composer package name. The template uses {{composerVendorName}}/{{composerProjectName}} for the composer package name. e.g. yaypets. IMPORTANT NOTE (2016/03): composerVendorName will be deprecated and replaced by gitUserId in the next swagger-codegen release

composerProjectName.description: The project name used in the composer package name. The template uses {{composerVendorName}}/{{composerProjectName}} for the composer package name. e.g. petstore-client. IMPORTANT NOTE (2016/03): composerProjectName will be deprecated and replaced by gitRepoId in the next swagger-codegen release

artifactVersion.description: The version to use in the composer package version field. e.g. 1.2.3

hideGenerationTimestamp.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false
